objects.specification: A large rectangular floor base with a smooth metallic dark grey surface, slightly reflective, and a thickness of approximately 10 cm, covering the entire booth area in a sleek industrial style.

A tall wall element made of sturdy panels with a smooth dark metallic grey finish, approximately 0.2 m thick and 3 m tall, designed to form the back perimeter of the booth with a modern industrial look.

A tall wall element made of sturdy panels with a smooth dark metallic grey finish, approximately 0.2 m thick and 3 m tall, designed to form the side perimeter of the booth with a modern industrial look.

A tall wall element made of sturdy panels with a smooth dark metallic grey finish, approximately 0.2 m thick and 3 m tall, designed to form the side perimeter of the booth with a modern industrial look.

A sleek demo sports car asset featuring a low-profile aerodynamic body, metallic red finish with glossy shine, detailed alloy rims, tinted windows, and realistic styling elements, oriented to face the open front entrance.
A sleek, modern reception desk with a rectangular shape, smooth white glossy surface, slim metallic support frame, sized to accommodate two attendants comfortably with integrated cable management.
A vertical rectangular display stand with a bright red slim frame, matte panel surface for information graphics at eye level, in a minimalistic modern style.

A small round table with a clear glass top and slender polished metal cylindrical legs, sized for casual seating and brochure display in a minimalist modern design.
A modern visitor chair with a contoured light grey plastic seat, matte finish, and slim metal tubular legs, ergonomic design suitable for fair environments.
